wheel module¶

class wheel.Wheel¶

Bases: object

Wheel contains the 38 bins present on a roulette wheel and a random number generator. Thus, It can select a bin at random, simulating the spin of a roulette wheel.

addOutcome(number, outcome)¶

Adds the given outcome to the bin with the given number.

Parameters:
  • bin – (int)
  • outcome – (Outcome)
get(number)¶
Parameters:bin – (int)
Returns:(Bin)
getOutcome(name)¶

Getter to fecth Outcome Object from the map of Outcomes

Parameters:name – (str)
Returns:(Outcome)
next()¶

Generates a random number between 0 and 37 with replacement, and returns the randomly selected bin there by simulating a spin of the roulette wheel

Returns:(Bin)
